remarks: All variable hypotheses are in the closure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mclsval.d $e |- D = ( mDV ` T ) $.
mclsval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mclsval.c $e |- C = ( mCls ` T ) $.
mclsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> T e. mFS ) $.
mclsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> K C_ D ) $.
mclsval.3 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ E ) $.
ssmclslem.h $e |- H = ( mVH ` T ) $.
vhmcls.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
vhmcls.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
vhmcls $p |- ( ph -> ( H ` X ) e. ( K C B ) ) $.
